txt.en: The Central Crystal has been saved
[placeholder]% of the Central Crystal Covered with Webbing
Protect the central crystal from being covered in webbing by the waves of cave spiders. Search the spiders' tunnel for trapped Rohirrim and defeat the cave spider queen, Scimgrit.
'Spiders from the tunnels! They hate the light of the crystals.'
You were forced to fall back before the spiders could be contained!
'If this large crystal goes dark, we will not be able to see and fight off the enemy!'
'We must protect the crystal and find the queen behind these spiders!'
Defeat the spiders assaulting the crystal ([placeholder]/6)

The fighting in the Glittering Caves has awoken and angered a large nest of cave spiders. They will attempt to cover the large glowing crystal in the central chamber in the north eastern part of the cave with webbing, as the light it emits blinds and angers them.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>Full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#00FF00>Minor Point Gain</rgb>
- Rohirrim freed from cocoon

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Point Loss</rgb>
- Every 25% of Central Crystal's health
Prevent the Spiders from covering the Crystal with webbing
The Central Crystal has been covered in webbing
